name: Stares Menacingly, Tauntingly
description:
Stares Menacingly, Tauntingly

Wow, rolling 6 sided dice around a checkerboard sure is harder than it looks! You'll need to think ahead to navigate narrow corridors and blocked paths. Whats this? A normal die won't do? Repaint dice on the fly to fool these confounded contraptions. Outsmarted by a die? hah! Before you know it you'll be face to face with the serpent itself.

-Created for the GMTK Game Jam of 2022, under the theme "Roll of the Dice." 

-9 handcrafted stages

-Sorry folks, the sweet sweet ASMR dice tapping did not make the cut. Sound is disabled. Bring your own jams.

-Included dev tool - function keys F7 and F8 can speed you through the stages if desired

-Asset credits to:

Snake" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://www.freepik.com/vectors/snake">Snake vector created by freepik - www.freepik.com

3D models from Cartoon Temple Building Kit Lite by A3D www.artstation.com/a3d
